spec.description: Monitors Kubernetes cluster using Prometheus. Shows overall cluster CPU / Memory / Filesystem usage as well as individual pod, containers, systemd services statistics. Uses cAdvisor metrics only.

targets.expr: sum (rate (container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{pod=~"${pod:regex}",image!="",name!~"^k8s_.*",kubernetes_io_hostname=~"^$Node$"}[5m])) by (kubernetes_io_hostname, name, image, container, pod)
sum (rate (container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{pod=~"${pod:regex}",image!="",name!~"^k8s_.*",kubernetes_io_hostname=~"^$Node$"}[5m])) by (kubernetes_io_hostname, name, image, container, pod)

spec.title: K8s-Deployments
